docs.snippet: The Indiana Pacers snapped a 12-game regular-season losing streak in Atlanta while improving the league’s best record to 38-10....

docs.snippet: Coach Mike Woodson said “a lot of little things” combined to sink his club during games, but there was a bigger one, too: perimeter defense....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Woodson said “a lot of little things” combined to sink his club during games, but there was a bigger one, too: perimeter defense.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks coach MIke Woodson addresses team's embarrassing loss to the Milwaukee Bucks, the worst team in the NBA; perimeter defense continues to be one of team's greatest weaknesses.

headline.main: Knicks Hope Bucks Loss Was Hiccup

docs.snippet: Tim Duncan scored a season-high 31 points Wednesday night before fouling out in the second overtime, and the San Antonio Spurs beat the Washington Wizards for an NBA-high 16th time in a row, holding on for a 125-118 victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan scored a season-high 31 points Wednesday night before fouling out in the second overtime, and the San Antonio Spurs beat the Washington Wizards for an NBA-high 16th time in a row, holding on for a 125-118 victory.

headline.main: Spurs Win 16th in Row vs Wizards, 125-118 in 2OT
